tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE mobile_app_usage_data (
  user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT,
  session_start_time TIMESTAMP,
  session_end_time TIMESTAMP,
  time_spent_in_app INT,
  ads_clicked INT,
  promotions_viewed INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    gender CHAR(1),
    age INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE app_usage (
    user_id UUID,
    app_id UUID,
    session_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_details VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE AppDetails (
  app_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_name VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(50),
  developer VARCHAR(100),
  release_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE AdImpressions (
  impression_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  app_id INT,
  user_id INT,
  impression_time TIMESTAMP,
  ad_id INT,
  ad_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE app_users (
   user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
   email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   age INT,
   last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE User (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    age INT NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE App (
    app_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    app_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    platform VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    release_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE User_App_Usage (
    user_id UUID REFERENCES User(user_id),
    app_id UUID REFERENCES App(app_id),
    install_date DATE NOT NULL,
    last_opened TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    total_usage_minutes INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Advertisements (
    ad_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    ad_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    ad_platform VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    ad_budget DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);
